text: Anderson Lago Zeze (born July 13, 1989) is an Ivorian football player, who plays as a Midfielder and can be used as a Winger . == Career == Zeze began his career with the Académie de Sol Beni the youth academy of ASEC MimosasSK Kladno Profile and signed on 1 August 2008 a contract for SK Kladno,Lago Zeze Anderson _ Kladno - Football Lineups his first professional game was on 28 October 2008 against 1. FC BrnoMatch Statistics: Brno vs Kladno - Football Lineups of the Gambrinus liga, the top league in the Czech Republic. == International == In 2008 Zeze was called up to a training camp with the Côte d'Ivoire under-20 national == References == ==External links== * http://www.sport-ivoire.ci/football/?p=1&id;=7930 * http://www.footmercato.net/joueur/j65134_anderson-lago-zeze * http://sofifa.com/fr/fifa10/player/148561-anderson-lago-zeze Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Czech First League players Category:SK Kladno players Category:FK Viktoria Žižkov players Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Ivorian expatriates in the Czech Republic Category:CD Laudio players Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan Category:Association football midfielders
title: Anderson Lago Zeze
